text:
**Match Details**

* Date: Monday, July 8, 2024
* Time: Various times depending on the region (listed in the article)
* Venue: Church Street Park, Morrisville, North Carolina, United States
* Weather: 33°C (91.4°F) with a possibility of a thunderstorm

**Teams**

* Washington Freedom: Coming off a 4-run DLS victory over MI New York in their opening game, with a strong squad led by Steve Smith.
* Texas Super Kings: Lost their opening game to Los Angeles Knight Riders by 12 runs, with an experienced team built with the help of Chennai Super Kings.

**Form**

* Washington Freedom: WLLWW in their last five games
* Texas Super Kings: LLLWL in their last five games

**Key Players**

* Washington Freedom: Steve Smith, Travis Head, Glenn Maxwell, Marco Jansen, Lockie Ferguson, and Saurabh Netravalkar
* Texas Super Kings: Aaron Hardie, Marcus Stoinis, Faf du Plessis, Devon Conway, Zia-ul-Haq, and Mohammad Mohsin

**Prediction**

* Washington Freedom are favored to win the match, despite not being overly convincing in their opening game win over MI New York.

**Tournament Details:**

* The second edition of the Major League Cricket (MLC) tournament has started on July 6, 2024, with the opener between reigning champions MI New York and Seattle Orcas at Church Street Park, Morrisville.
* The grand finale will be played on July 29, 2024, at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Texas.
* The tournament features six teams: San Francisco Unicorns, Washington Freedom, Texas Super Kings, Seattle Orcas, Los Angeles Knight Riders, and MI New York.

**Teams and Players:**

* Indian cricket franchises Mumbai Indians, Kolkata Knight Riders, and Chennai Super Kings are participating in the tournament.
* Notable cricketers participating include Quinton de Kock, Marcus Stoinis, and Nicholas Pooran, who was the Player of the Season last year with 388 runs.

**Broadcasting:**

* Sony Sports Network has acquired the exclusive television rights for MLC in India for one year.
* The tournament will be telecast live in India on Sony Sports Network.

**Commentary Panel:**

* The MLC's second season features an all-star lineup of announcers, including Sunil Gavaskar, Wasim Akram, Danny Morrison, and others.

**Match Details**: The 4th match of the Major League Cricket 2024 will be played between San Francisco Unicorns (SF) and Los Angeles Kinght Riders (LAS) on July 7, 2024, at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas.

**Head-to-Head**: San Francisco Unicorns lead the head-to-head record 1-0, having won the only previous match between the two teams in the first edition of the tournament.

**Weather and Pitch Report**: The weather is expected to be clear with a temperature of 27°C, moderate wind speed, and humidity levels between 50-55%. The pitch is good for batting, with some early swing and seam for fast bowlers, and the team batting second will have an edge.

**Predicted XIs**: The predicted lineups for both teams are provided in the article.

**Dream11 Fantasy Teams**: Two suggested Dream11 fantasy teams are provided, along with captain and vice-captain choices.

**Match Prediction**: The article predicts that Los Angeles Kinght Riders will win the match, given their win in their previous game and San Francisco Unicorns starting their campaign.

**Tournament Details:**

* Tournament name: Major League Cricket (MLC) 2024
* Start date: July 5, 2024 (July 6, IST)
* Number of teams: 6
* Number of matches: 25

**Match Details:**

* First match: MI New York (NY) vs Seattle Orcas (SEA)
* Date: July 5, 2024 (Friday)
* Time: 01:00 A.M. IST (Saturday, July 6) / 07:30 PM GMT / 03:30 PM LOCAL
* Venue: Church Street Park, Morrisville

**Head-to-Head:**

* MI New York and Seattle Orcas have played two games against each other, with one win each. MI New York won the final of the 2023 edition.

**Weather and Pitch Report:**

* Weather: Hot and humid, with a temperature of 37° C and humidity between 40 and 45 percent.
* Pitch Report: The pitch at Church Street Park is decent for batting, with initial help for pacers, but spinners will be in the game due to hot and dry conditions.

* The Los Angeles Knight Riders, who won their first match against the Texas Super Kings, will face the San Francisco Unicorns on July 8 at 6:00 AM IST.
* The match will be broadcast live on Sony Sports Ten 5 TV channel, and online live streaming will be available for free on the JioCinema app and website.
* The San Francisco Unicorns are playing their first match in the tournament.

Note: There is also a mention of another match between Washington Freedom and MI New York, where Steve Smith and Saurabh Netravalkar shone in Washington Freedom's win, but the main focus of the article is on the upcoming match between Los Angeles Knight Riders and San Francisco Unicorns.

**Match Information**

* Match 4 of the Major League Cricket, 2024 is between San Francisco Unicorns and Los Angeles Knight Riders (SF vs LAS) on July 8, 2024, at 06:00 AM IST at the Grand Prairie Cricket Stadium, Dallas.

**Team Information**

* Los Angeles Knight Riders have played 1 match in the tournament and are ranked second on the points table, while San Francisco Unicorns are playing their first game of this season.
* In their last 5 games, San Francisco Unicorns have won 2 games and lost 3.

**Head to Head**

* In the only match played between these 2 teams, Los Angeles Knight Riders lost to San Francisco Unicorns.

**Pitch and Weather Report**

* The pitch at the Grand Prairie Cricket Stadium, Dallas is a sporting one with decent assistance for both batters and bowlers on offer.
* Temperature is expected to be around 33.37 °C and humidity is expected to be around 42%. 3.19 m/s winds are also expected.

**Key Players**

* Saif Badar, Jason Jonathan Roy, and Finnley Hugh Allen are top batter picks.
* Haris Rauf, Spencer Henry Johnson, and Muhammad Ahsan Ali Khan are top bowler picks.
* Sunil Philip Narine, Andre Dwayne Russell, and Tajinder Singh Dhillon are top all-rounder picks.

**Captain and Vice-Captain Picks**

* Sunil Philip Narine, Saif Badar, and Andre Dwayne Russell are top captain and vice-captain picks.

**Match 4: LA Knight Riders vs San Francisco Unicorns**

The match will be played on July 7th at the Grand Prairie Stadium, Texas.

**LA Knight Riders**

* Currently 2nd on the points table with 1 win
* Top run scorer: Unmukt Chand (68 runs)
* Top wicket taker: Ali Khan (4 wickets)
* Won their first match against Texas Super Kings by 12 runs, with Unmukt Chand scoring 68 runs and Nitish Kumar contributing 26 runs.

**San Francisco Unicorns**

* Finished 5th on the points table in the previous edition
* Top run scorer: Corey Anderson (190 runs)
* Top wicket taker: Liam Plunkett (7 wickets)
* Have a strong squad with players like Pat Cummins, Jake Fraser-McGurk, Matt Henry, Haris Rauf, and Josh Inglis, and are expected to make it to the playoffs easily.

**Players to Watch**

* Jake Fraser-McGurk: Exciting T20 player who performed well in the Indian Premier League and is expected to continue his good form.
* Pat Cummins: Picked up 2 hat-tricks in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup and is expected to continue his good form with the ball.

**Match Preview**: The article previews the fourth group-stage match of MLC 2024 between San Francisco Unicorns and Los Angeles Knight Riders, scheduled to take place at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas on Monday.

**Team Previews**:

* **San Francisco Unicorns**: Led by Corey Anderson, the team boasts a strong batting line-up with players like Finn Allen, Jake Fraser-McGurk, Matthew Short, Josh Inglis, and Sherfane Rutherford. Their bowling department is also strong, featuring Pat Cummins, Haris Rauf, Matt Henry, Liam Plunkett, and Abrar Ahmed.
* **Los Angeles Knight Riders**: The team had a winning start to MLC 2024, defeating Texas Super Kings by 12 runs. They have a strong all-round trio of Shakib Al Hasan, Andre Russell, and Sunil Narine, and will rely on Unmukt Chand, Nitish R Kumar, David Miller, and Jason Roy for batting success.

**Pitch Report**: The Grand Prairie Stadium pitch is expected to offer some assistance to fast bowlers, but the even pace of the track should allow batters to be effective if they play on top of the bounce.

**Probable Playing XIs**: The article provides the predicted playing line-ups for both teams.

**Winner Prediction**: The article predicts that Los Angeles Knight Riders will emerge victorious in this match, considering the strength of both teams.

* Match: MI New York vs Washington Freedom
* Result: Washington Freedom won by 4 runs (Duckworth-Lewis-Stern method) due to thunderstorms interrupting the game.
* MI New York's score: 154 for 9 in 20 overs, with Nicholas Pooran top-scoring with 44.
* Notable performances: Pooran (44), Rashid Khan (31 off 15 balls), Ruben Clinton (28 off 22 balls).
* Washington Freedom's score: 55 for 1 in 8 overs, with Steven Smith scoring an unbeaten 46 off 28 balls.
* Notable bowlers: Saurabh Netravalkar (3-24), Justin Dill (3-33), Akeal Hosein (1 over, 9 runs).

**Most Wickets in MLC 2024**

As of July 8, 2024, Spencer Johnson of LA Knight Riders has taken the top spot in the most wickets taken list with 5 wickets in 2 matches, followed by Ali Khan of LA Knight Riders with 4 wickets in 2 matches. The top 10 list includes players from various teams, with Trent Boult and Rashid Khan of MI New York, and Saurabh Netravalkar and Justin Dill of Washington Freedom, among others.

**Team-wise Top 5 Wicket-takers**

The article also provides the top 5 wicket-takers for each team in the tournament, including:

* MI New York: Rashid Khan (3 wickets), Trent Boult (3 wickets), Kieron Pollard (2 wickets), Ehsan Adil (2 wickets), and Anrich Nortje (1 wicket)
* Seattle Orcas: Cameron Gannon (2 wickets), Zaman Khan (1 wicket), and Nandre Burger (1 wicket)
* LA Knight Riders: Spencer Johnson (5 wickets), Ali Khan (4 wickets), Sunil Narine (2 wickets), and Shakib Al Hasan (1 wicket)
* Texas Super Kings: Zia-ul-Haq (2 wickets), Aaron Hardie (2 wickets), Marcus Stoinis (2 wickets), and Gerald Coetzee (1 wicket)
* Washington Freedom: Saurabh Netravalkar (3 wickets), Justin Dill (3 wickets), Glenn Maxwell (1 wicket), Lockie Ferguson (1 wicket), and Marco Jansen (1 wicket)
* San Francisco Unicorns: Brody Couch (2 wickets), Haris Rauf (2 wickets), Liam Plunkett (1 wicket), and Abrar Ahmed (1 wicket)

**Match Result:** San Francisco Unicorns won by 6 wickets against Los Angeles Knight Riders (LAKR) in the second season of Major League Cricket (MLC 2024).

**Match Details:** LAKR batted first and scored 165 for 6 in 20 overs, with Shakib Al Hasan scoring 35 and Andre Russell contributing 40*. In response, the Unicorns chased the target down comfortably, reaching 166 for 4 in 15.2 overs, thanks to Finn Allen's 63 and Matthew Short's 58.

**Key Performances:** Brody Couch and Haris Rauf took 2 wickets each for the Unicorns, while Finn Allen and Matthew Short formed a match-winning partnership of 116 runs for the second wicket.

**Takeaways:** This was LAKR's first defeat in MLC 2024, and they will need to regroup and strategize better for their upcoming matches. The San Francisco Unicorns have set a high standard for their season ahead with this dominant performance.

As of July 8, Nicholas Pooran of MI New York continues to lead the charts with 108 runs, while his closest competitor, Unmukt Chand of LA Knight Riders, slipped down the ranks after scoring a duck in his latest outing. Finn Allen and Matt Short of San Francisco Unicorns have moved up the leaderboard with their half-centuries. The top 10 highest run-scorers are not mentioned in the article, but the top 5 run-scorers for each of the six teams participating in the tournament are listed.

* The fourth match of Major League Cricket 2024 is scheduled to take place on July 8 at the Grand Prairie Cricket Stadium in Dallas.
* The San Francisco Unicorns (SF) will face the Los Angeles Knight Riders (LAS) in this match.
* The Los Angeles Knight Riders recently won their first game against the Texas Super Kings by 12 runs and are looking to continue their momentum.
* The Los Angeles Knight Riders had a poor performance in MLC 2023, finishing at the bottom of the points table, but are expected to make the playoffs in the current edition.
* The San Francisco Unicorns are playing their first game of the tournament and are looking for a strong start with a win.

**Match Preview**: Washington Freedom (WAS) will host Texas Super Kings (TEX) on July 09 at Church Street Park, Morrisville.

**Recent Form**: WAS won their previous match against MI New York, while TEX lost to Los Angeles Knight Riders in their opening game.

**Key Players**: For WAS, Saurabh Netravalkar and Justin Dill picked up three wickets each, while Glenn Maxwell and Lockie Ferguson have done well. Skipper Steven Smith led by example with the bat. For TEX, Devon Conway looked sensational, scoring a half-century, but other batters struggled.

**Pitch Report**: Morrisville's pitch is challenging for batters, but spending time in the middle can make a difference. Bowling first and scoring over 160 runs should be enough to defend the target.

**Probable Playing XI**: The article lists the probable playing XI for both teams.

**Top Performers**: Devon Conway is expected to be the best batter, and Saurabh Netravalkar is expected to be the best bowler.

**Match Prediction**: Washington Freedom are predicted to win the match in both scenarios, regardless of who wins the toss.

* The Major League Cricket (MLC) tournament is currently ongoing.
* Four members of the South African Test squad are competing in the MLC: Aiden Markram (Texas Super Kings), Kagiso Rabada (MI New York), Ryan Rickelton (Seattle Orcas), and Nandre Burger (Seattle Orcas).
* The MLC final is scheduled to take place on 28 July.
* The players participating in the MLC final will join the South African Test squad on 29 July in the Caribbean.

Major League Cricket (MLC) is expanding its audience in the United States by partnering with local Regional Sports Networks (RSNs) to broadcast matches from several teams. This comes at a time when cricket is gaining popularity in the US, following the national team's success in the ICC T20 World Cup. Currently, six teams are participating in the MLC, with five of them partnering with RSNs to air select games until the end of the season. The teams and their RSN partners are:

* DC Freedom: Monumental Sports Network
* LA Knight Riders: Bally Sports SoCal
* MI New York: YES Network
* Seattle Orcas: Root Sports Northwest
* Texas Super Kings: Bally Sports Southwest

The San Francisco Unicorns will not have an RSN partner, but all their matches will be broadcast on Willow TV. Additionally, three free matches will be available on Sling Freestream and other platforms on Sundays this month, starting on July 7.

* The match was played at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas, with the Unicorns winning the toss and opting to bowl first.
* The Knight Riders were restricted to 165/6 in their 20 overs, with Shakib Al Hasan scoring 35 and Andre Russell hitting 40 off 25 balls, including a massive 107-meter six off Haris Rauf.
* In response, the Unicorns chased down the target in 16 overs, with Finn Allen scoring 63 off 37 balls and Matt Short scoring 58 off 26 balls. The Unicorns won the match by six wickets.

1. Wayne Parnell (Seattle Orcas) - 5/20 against Texas Super Kings on July 21, 2023
2. Saurabh Netravalkar (Washington Freedom) - 6/93 (not exactly a 5-fer, but mentioned in the article) against San Francisco Unicorns on July 22, 2023

Note that the article mentions that more players will enter the MLC 5-fers list in the future, but as of the last update on July 6, 2024, only these two players have achieved this feat.

**Match Details**: The article discusses the upcoming Match 4 of the Major League Cricket 2024 tournament, which will be played between San Francisco Unicorns (SFU) and Los Angeles Knight Riders (LAKR) on Monday, July 8, 2024, at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Texas. The match is scheduled to start at 6:00 AM.

**Team News**: Both teams are performing well, with no injury concerns reported. The article provides predicted playing XIs for both teams.

**Recent Performance**: In Match 2, Los Angeles Knight Riders defeated Texas Super Kings by 12 runs, thanks to Unmukt Chand's 68 off 45 balls and Ali Khan's impressive bowling figures of 4/33.

**Dream11 Prediction**: The article provides a detailed Dream11 prediction for the SFU vs LAKR match, including suggestions for wicketkeepers, captains, vice-captains, batsmen, all-rounders, and bowlers.

The 4th match of the Major League Cricket 2024 will be played between the San Francisco Unicorns and the Los Angeles Knight Riders at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas, Texas. This is the San Francisco Unicorns' debut match in the season. The Los Angeles Knight Riders are coming off a confident win in their first match and look to build on that success. The pitch at Grand Prairie Stadium is expected to be batting-friendly, and the weather is expected to be clear. There are no injury updates from either side. The predicted playing XIs for both teams are listed in the article. The Los Angeles Knight Riders are the favorites to win the game due to their stronger squad.

**Match Details**

* Match 5: Washington Freedom vs Texas Super Kings
* Venue: Church Street Park, Morrisville
* Weather: Clear, no chance of rain
* Pitch: Batting-friendly, short boundaries, and true bounce

**Team Standings**

* Washington Freedom: 3rd on the points table with 2 points from a win in their first match
* Texas Super Kings: 5th on the points table with a net run rate of -0.600 after losing their first match

**Predicted Playing XIs**

* Washington Freedom: Steven Smith, Akhilesh Reddy, Jack Edwards, Andris Gous, Travis Head, Lahiru Milantha, Glenn Maxwell, Rachin Ravindra, Marco Jansen, Akeal Hosein, Lockie Ferguson
* Texas Super Kings: Faf du Plessis (C), Devon Conway (WK), Marcus Stoinis, Dwayne Bravo, Daniel Sams, Imran Tahir, Naveen-ul-Haq, Gerald Coetzee, Calvin Savage, Mitchell Santner, Noor Ahmad

**Match Prediction**

* Washington Freedom are the favourites to win the game due to their stronger squad strength.

The article previews Match 4 of the Major League Cricket tournament, which will be played between the San Francisco Unicorns (SF) and the Los Angeles Knight Riders (LAS). The article promises to provide player records and head-to-head records for the teams ahead of the match.
